title: The Buggy Blues
description: Pepper had everything an immigrant from Jamaica could a career, an amazing husband and good friends. Yet, there had been something missing in her life. She yearned to start her own family. However, it hadn’t been as easy as she’d thought it would be. Even so, she was desperate to maintain the good relationship she had with her husband, in spite of her infertility. Reminiscently, she takes you on a journey of her relationship with Neil, and the obstacles that can occur when a baby is wanted, but hadn’t been delivered.
author: Kayon Wendruff
